amendment.description: To implement the congressional oversight recommendations of the 9-11 Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 88 - 3. Record Vote Number: 204.
Cloture motion on Amendment SA 3981 presented in Senate.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
